verses.content: LALPAIN Zion salhai a ṭhuoi kîr lai khan, Manga mangtuhai ang el ei na,
Chuong lai chun ei bau chu innuiin a sip a, Ei lei chu hla sakin. Chuong lai chun hnam tin laia chun, “LALPAIN an ta dingin thil ropuitakhai a thawpêk a nih,” an tih a.
LALPA chun thil ropuitakhai a mi thawpêk a, Ei lâwm hleh a.
Aw LALPA, sala kan intâng hi mi ṭhuoi kîr nâwk la, Sim rama vadunghai angin,
Mitthli tla puma tûtuhai chun hlimtakin sîk an tih.
Ṭap pumin bu chi fe suokpui sien khawm, A bu phalhai chawiin hlimtakin hung nâwk a tih.
